channel.title: Need a hoster for Project Fire
channel.description:
Hello I need a host for my new server Project Fire.
The server is based around Relleka. There is full woodcutting/fishing/smithing/mining/fletching/herblore/thieving/range/mage. I have added a dungeon that is highly edited. It has 4 bosses inside it that drop good items. None of the monsters will respawn until all of them will be killed, some of the monsters will require a team to kill. There is much more, if you are interested post here or add my MSN: i-noodle@hotmail.com.

item.title: Need a hoster for Project Fire
item.dc:creator: @KiIIer KiIIer
